title: Bitcoin (BTC/USD) Analysis: Trump Impact, Whale Activity & Price Predictions
description: Bitcoin’s price dipped despite initial gains following President Trump’s crypto event appearance. New “whale” investors have accumulated a large amount of Bitcoin, suggesting potential for a near-term price increase, but on-chain data shows weakening demand and liquidity. Bitcoin ETF flows turn negative after four consecutive days of gains as Gold ETFs thrive.
